transformations.name: DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi
transformations.description: Add derived columns + columns with literal values

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		rate_code_id as double,
		pickup_location_id as long,
		dropoff_location_id as long,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double,
		passenger_count as double,
		trip_distance as double,
		fare_amount as double,
		extra as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		ehail_fee as integer,
		improvement_surcharge as double,
		total_amount as double,
		payment_type as string,
		trip_type as double,
		congestion_surcharge as double,
		surcharge as double,
		airport_fee as double,
		taxi_type as string,
		trip_year as string,
		trip_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'dataset_file_nm',
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['nyctaxi-raw-df/transactions/yellow-taxi/*/*/*.parquet']) ~> RawYellowTaxi
source(output(
		payment_type as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawPaymentType
source(output(
		rate_code_id as short,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawRateCode
source(output(
		LocationID as string,
		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		service_zone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawTaxiZone
source(output(
		vendor_id as short,
		abbreviation as string,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawVendor
source(output(
		trip_type as integer,
		description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawTripType
source(output(
		trip_month as string,
		month_name_short as string,
		month_name_full as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> RawTripMonth
RawYellowTaxi select(mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		congestion_surcharge,
		trip_year,
		trip_month,
		taxi_type,
		dataset_file_nm,
		airport_fee,
		surcharge,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectYellowTaxiColumns
SelectYellowTaxiColumns derive(pickup_year = year(pickup_datetime),
		pickup_month = month(pickup_datetime),
		pickup_day = dayOfWeek(pickup_datetime),
		pickup_hour = hour(pickup_datetime),
		pickup_minute = minute(pickup_datetime),
		pickup_second = second(pickup_datetime),
		dropoff_year = year(dropoff_datetime),
		dropoff_month = month(dropoff_datetime),
		dropoff_day = dayOfWeek(dropoff_datetime),
		dropoff_hour = hour(dropoff_datetime),
		dropoff_minute = minute(dropoff_datetime),
		dropoff_second = second(dropoff_datetime),
		trip_year = substring(dataset_file_nm,(instr(dataset_file_nm, 'trip_year=')+10),4),
		trip_month = replace(substring(dataset_file_nm,(instr(dataset_file_nm, 'trip_month=')+11),2), '/', '')) ~> DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi
DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi, RawPaymentType join(SelectYellowTaxiColumns@payment_type == toString(RawPaymentType@payment_type),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithPaymentType
JoinWithTripMonth, RawRateCode join(SelectYellowTaxiColumns@rate_code_id == RawRateCode@rate_code_id,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithRateZone
JoinWithRateZone, RawTaxiZone join(pickup_location_id == toInteger(LocationID),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithTaxiZoneForPickup
JoinWithTaxiZoneForPickup select(mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id = SelectYellowTaxiColumns@rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type = SelectYellowTaxiColumns@payment_type,
		trip_type = SelectYellowTaxiColumns@trip_type,
		congestion_surcharge,
		dataset_file_nm,
		trip_year,
		trip_month = DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi@trip_month,
		taxi_type,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		payment_type_description = RawPaymentType@description,
		rate_code_description = RawRateCode@description,
		pickup_borough = Borough,
		pickup_zone = Zone,
		pickup_service_zone = service_zone,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		trip_type_description = RawTripType@description,
		surcharge,
		airport_fee,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		LocationID,
		abbreviation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReorderAndRenamePickupZone
ReorderAndRenamePickupZone, RawTaxiZone join(dropoff_location_id == toInteger(RawTaxiZone@LocationID),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithTaxiZoneForDropOff
JoinWithTaxiZoneForDropOff select(mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		congestion_surcharge,
		trip_year,
		trip_month,
		taxi_type,
		dataset_file_nm,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		payment_type_description,
		rate_code_description,
		pickup_borough,
		pickup_zone,
		pickup_service_zone,
		dropoff_borough = Borough,
		dropoff_zone = Zone,
		dropoff_service_zone = service_zone,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		trip_type_description,
		abbreviation,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		airport_fee,
		surcharge
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReorderAndRenameDropoffZone
ReorderAndRenameDropoffZone, RawVendor join(ReorderAndRenameDropoffZone@vendor_id == toString(RawVendor@vendor_id),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithVendor
JoinWithVendor select(mapColumn(
		vendor_id = ReorderAndRenameDropoffZone@vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		congestion_surcharge,
		surcharge,
		airport_fee,
		vendor_abbreviation = RawVendor@abbreviation,
		vendor_description = description,
		trip_type_description,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		payment_type_description,
		rate_code_description,
		pickup_borough,
		pickup_zone,
		pickup_service_zone,
		dropoff_borough,
		dropoff_zone,
		dropoff_service_zone,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		trip_year,
		trip_month,
		taxi_type,
		dataset_file_nm
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FinalColumnList
JoinWithPaymentType, RawTripType join(SelectYellowTaxiColumns@trip_type == RawTripType@trip_type,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithTripType
JoinWithTripType, RawTripMonth join(toInteger(DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi@trip_month) == toInteger(RawTripMonth@trip_month),
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithTripMonth
FinalColumnList sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'nyctaxi',
	folderPath: 'nyctaxi-curated-df/transactions/yellow-taxi',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		trip_year,
		trip_month
	)) ~> SinkToCuratedZone
